title: Cannot connect to NA
body: After a recent game I was disconnected and exited out of the client. Now whenever I open it I am given a popup that says, "Trying to reconnect...., We are attempting to automatically reconnect you to league of legends. If your internet connection is otherwise ok, check our support page for possible solutions". I've been through everything on the support page and can't seem to rectify this error, Has persisted for approximately 1 hour. What gives? I can't even get to the login page!

replies.body: Some players are currently experiencing login issues, per the current [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page.  I don't have any eta, but bookmark that site as more information comes in.  Hang on until this is all fixed up!

What's your internet service provider? WOW! Internet? Charter? Both have been reported to have problems this morning almost immediately after the Dreadnova GP patch.

ALSO, my own issue seems to be able to be rectified by simply launching the legacy client. The reconnect error isn't ALWAYS up for me, though, which lets me do this.
